```{r}

incomplete_cdf <- function(x, gmin, gmax) {
  cdf <- rle(sort(na.omit(x)))
  obsx <- cdf$values
  obsy <- cumsum(cdf$lengths)/length(x)
  data.frame(x = c(gmin, obsx, gmax) , y=c(0, obsy, tail(obsy, 1)))
}

RandomMatrix <- function(itero = TRUE, fast = TRUE, lambdarange = c(0.8,1.2),nummats = 100, fastslowcutoff = 5){
  set.seed(1234)
  mat_list <- list()
  i <- 1
  
  while(length(mat_list)<=nummats){
    if(fast){
      if(itero){
        # col1 <- rdirichlet(1,c(7,7,4)) # S1, growth, death
        col1 <- rdirichlet(1,c(0.01,7,4)) # S1 ca. 0, growth, death
        col2 <- rdirichlet(1, c(5,5)) # S2, death
        f <- itero_fecundsurv(col2[1]) * runif(1, 0.2,0.9) # a little seed that has a variable chance of adding to new individuals
        t_ij <- matrix(c(col1[1], col1[2],
                         f, col2[1]),
                       nrow = 2)
      } else {
        # Semelparous
        # col1 <- rdirichlet(1,c(7,7,4)) # S1, growth, death
        col1 <- rdirichlet(1,c(1,7,4)) # S1 should be lower than growth, growth, death
        col2 <- rdirichlet(1, c(1,10)) # S2, death
        f <- semel_fecundsurv(col2[1]) * runif(1, 0.2,0.9)
        t_ij <- matrix(c(col1[1], col1[2],
                         f, 0),
                       nrow = 2)
        } # end parity
    } else { # for slow
      if(itero){
        col1 <- rdirichlet(1,c(7,7,4)) # S1, growth, death
        col2 <- rdirichlet(1, c(5,5)) # S2, death
        f <- itero_fecundsurv(col2[1]) * runif(1, 0.2,0.9)
        t_ij <- matrix(c(col1[1], col1[2],
                         f, col2[1]),
                       nrow = 2)
      } else {
        # Semelparous
        col1 <- rdirichlet(1,c(7,1,4)) # S1, growth, death
        # col2 <- rdirichlet(1, c(1,10)) # S2, death
        col2 <- rdirichlet(1, c(0.01,10)) # S2 ca 0, death
        f <- semel_fecundsurv(col2[1]) * runif(1, 0.2,0.9)
        t_ij <- matrix(c(col1[1], col1[2],
                         f, 0),
                       nrow = 2)
      } # end parity
    } # End speed
  
    (lambda1 <- lambda(t_ij))
      if(lambda1 >= lambdarange[1] & lambda1 <= lambdarange[2]){
        if(fast){
          if(generation.time(t_ij) < fastslowcutoff){
            mat_list[[i]] <- t_ij
            i <- i+1
            }
          } else {
            # Slow
            if(generation.time(t_ij) >= fastslowcutoff){
            # if(generation.time(t_ij) >= 10){
              mat_list[[i]] <- t_ij
              i <- i+1
            }
            }
      } # end while building index list
  }
  
  e_ij <- lapply(mat_list, function(x) popbio::elasticity(x))
  
  Elasts <- do.call(rbind, lapply(e_ij, function(el){
    survivalElast <- sum(el[which(generic_mat == "L")])
    growthElast <- sum(el[which(generic_mat == "G")])
    fecundElast <- sum(el[which(generic_mat == "F")])
    data.frame(S = survivalElast, G = growthElast, R = fecundElast)
  }))
  
  listout <- list(mat_list, e_ij, 
                  data.frame(Elasts, lam = sapply(mat_list, function(tij) lambda(tij)),
                             gentim = sapply(mat_list, function(tij) generation.time(tij)),
                             lifeexpectancy = sapply(mat_list, function(tij) sum(fundamental.matrix(tij, r = 1, c=2)$meaneta)),
                             netrep = sapply(mat_list, function(tij) net.reproductive.rate(tij)) ))
  # return(listout)
  listout
  }
```

Simulation
```{r}

virtualPVA <- function(StartPopSize, MPMs, speed = "fast", parity = "itero", annualYN = FALSE, reps = 1000, simlength = 500){
  # replicate simulations
  set.seed(1234)
  dfout <- do.call(rbind,lapply(1:reps, function(repl){
    Nx <- stable.stage(mean(MPMs))
    if(annualYN){
      vec1 <- matrix(round(Nx*(StartPopSize/Nx[2]),0), ncol = 1)
    } else {
      vec1 <- matrix(floor(Nx*(StartPopSize/sum(Nx))), ncol = 1)
    }
    
    # Initialize for loop
    Extant <- c()
    yr <- c()
    mats <- list()
    gentim <- c()
    netrep <- c()
    popsz <- c()
    detlam <- c()
    Time2Ext <- NA
    for(i in 1:simlength){
      yr[i] <- i
      mats[[i]] <- sample(MPMs,size = 1)[[1]]
      if(annualYN){
        gentim[i] <- popbio::generation.time(mats[[i]], r = c(1,2), c = 2)
        netrep[i] <- net.reproductive.rate(mats[[i]], r=c(1,2), c=2)
      } else {
        gentim[i] <- popbio::generation.time(mats[[i]])
        netrep[i] = net.reproductive.rate(mats[[i]])
      }
      detlam[i] <- popbio::lambda(mean(mats))
      vec1 <- floor(mats[[i]]%*%vec1)
      if(annualYN){
        popsz[i] <- vec1[2]
      } else {
        popsz[i] <- sum(vec1)
      }
      Extant[i] <- if(popsz[i]<1) 0 else 1
      if(Extant[i] == 0) Time2Ext <- i
      if(popsz[i] == 0) break
    }
    
    dfMPM <- data.frame(PopSize = popsz, Year = yr, parity = parity, speed = speed, GenTime = gentim,
                        netrep = netrep,
                        Extant = Extant, StPopSz = StartPopSize, Time2Extinction = Time2Ext,
                        Replicate = repl, detlam = detlam)
    dfMPM
  }))
  dfout
}
```

# test harvesting (reducing fecundity)   
# Ooops! have it as fecundity <- harvestintensity * fecundity so by having it be 0.10 it really simulated 90% harvest. Should be (1-harvestintensity)*fecundity
_harvest2021-09-28 are all 90% intensity 10% of the time
```{r}

harvestPVA <- function(StartPopSize, MPMs, speed = "fast", parity = "itero", annualYN = FALSE, reps = 1000, simlength = 500, harvestintensity = 0.10, harvestfrequency = 0.10){
  # replicate simulations
  set.seed(1234)
  dfout <- do.call(rbind,lapply(1:reps, function(repl){
    Nx <- stable.stage(mean(MPMs))
    if(annualYN){
      vec1 <- matrix(round(Nx*(StartPopSize/Nx[2]),0), ncol = 1)
    } else {
      vec1 <- matrix(floor(Nx*(StartPopSize/sum(Nx))), ncol = 1)
    }
    
    # Initialize for loop
    Extant <- c()
    yr <- c()
    mats <- list()
    gentim <- c()
    netrep <- c()
    popsz <- c()
    detlam <- c()
    Time2Ext <- NA
    # sample the number of years equal to the percent of the time to harvest
    harvestyrs <- sample(1:simlength, size = floor(simlength*harvestfrequency))
    # so really gets us to year simlength+1
    for(i in 1:simlength){
      # Harvest == 10% reduction in fecundity 10% of the time
      yr[i] <- i
      mats[[i]] <- sample(MPMs,size = 1)[[1]]
      if(i %in% harvestyrs) mats[[i]][1,2] <- mats[[i]][1,2]*(1-harvestintensity)
      if(annualYN){
        gentim[i] <- popbio::generation.time(mats[[i]], r = c(1,2), c = 2)
        netrep[i] <- net.reproductive.rate(mats[[i]], r=c(1,2), c=2)
      } else {
        gentim[i] <- popbio::generation.time(mats[[i]])
        netrep[i] = net.reproductive.rate(mats[[i]])
      }
      detlam[i] <- popbio::lambda(mean(mats))
      vec1 <- floor(mats[[i]]%*%vec1)
      if(annualYN){
        popsz[i] <- vec1[2]
      } else {
        popsz[i] <- sum(vec1)
      }
      Extant[i] <- if(popsz[i]<1) 0 else 1
      if(Extant[i] == 0) Time2Ext <- i
      if(popsz[i] == 0) break
    }
    
    dfMPM <- data.frame(PopSize = popsz, Year = yr, parity = parity, speed = speed, GenTime = gentim,
                        netrep = netrep,
                        Extant = Extant, StPopSz = StartPopSize, Time2Extinction = Time2Ext,
                        Replicate = repl, detlam = detlam)
    dfMPM
  }))
  dfout
}
```

```{r}
semel_fecundsurv <- function(s){
  12.5*((s - 0.9)^2) - 0.125
}

itero_fecundsurv <- function(s){
  -12.5*((s + 0.1)^2) + 10.125
}

matrix_elast <- function(Mx_dim = 2){
  x <- matrix(rep("L",Mx_dim^2), ncol = Mx_dim)
  x[lower.tri(x)] <- "G"
  x[upper.tri(x)] <- "R" # retrogressive growth
  x[1,Mx_dim] <- "F" # fecundity
  x
}

generic_mat <- matrix_elast(2)
```

```{r}
## plotting doesn't handle NA values 
## pre-calculate values using dplyr
incomplete_cdf <- function(x, gmin, gmax) {
  cdf <- rle(sort(na.omit(x)))
  obsx <- cdf$values
  obsy <- cumsum(cdf$lengths)/length(x)
  data.frame(x = c(gmin, obsx, gmax) , y=c(0, obsy, tail(obsy, 1)))
}
```

```{r}
incomp_points <- all_managment %>% 
  mutate(gmin =min(Time2Extinction, na.rm=TRUE), gmax=max(Time2Extinction, na.rm=TRUE)) %>% 
  group_by(parity,speed,management,StPopSz) %>% 
  summarize(incomplete_cdf(Time2Extinction, first(gmin), first(gmax))) 

incomp_points_df <- (as.data.frame(incomp_points))

x <- split(incomp_points, list(incomp_points$parity,incomp_points$speed,
                                 incomp_points$StPopSz,incomp_points$management))[[1]]

ERat100yrs <- do.call(rbind,lapply(split(incomp_points, list(incomp_points$parity,incomp_points$speed,
                                 incomp_points$StPopSz,incomp_points$management)),
             function(x){
               # for some, the CDF reaches 100% after 100 years and no values are recorded at 100
               if(max(x$x[x$x < 101])){
                 data.frame(x[1,], PercERat100yrs = x$y[x$x == max(x$x[x$x < 101])])
               } else {
                 # When there is never any extinctions, years are 2 and 500
                 if(max(x$y) == 0 & min(x$x[-1]) > 100){
                   data.frame(x[1,], PercERat100yrs = 0)
                 } else {
                 data.frame(x[1,], PercERat100yrs = x$y[x$x == min(100, max(x$x))])
                   }
                 }
               }))


## To match Menges et al. 2004 figure
ggplot(ERat100yrs[ERat100yrs$management != "harvest90",], aes(interaction(management, speed, parity), PercERat100yrs, 
                       fill = interaction(speed, parity),
                       alpha = management))+  
  facet_wrap(~StPopSz, scales = "free_x")+
  theme_bw()+
  scale_alpha_manual(values = c(harvest10 = 1, 
                                # harvest90 = 0.5, 
                                none = 0.2),
                     name = "Management",
                     labels = c("10% harvest intensity\n and frequency",
                                # "90% harvest intensity\n and 10% frequency",
                                "none")) +
  # geom_point()+
  geom_bar(stat = "identity")+
  theme(# axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1, vjust = 0.5),
        axis.title.x=element_blank(),
        axis.text.x=element_blank(),
        axis.ticks.x=element_blank())+
```
